info.name: PWA Lock
info.summary: Little privacy protection for Nextcloud running as a PWA
info.description: Adds a client-side privacy lock overlay for Nextcloud when used as a Progressive Web App (PWA). The overlay can be triggered on idle and/or when the app is backgrounded, and can require a user code to unlock. After repeated failed attempts the app can notify the user and optionally force a logout.
info.author: Mken
